title: Going to Dentist (Doctor) of the opposite gender permissible? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: yusuf from holland he says can we go to a dentist from the opposite gender the answer is no generally speaking but if it is paid by the government and i don't have means to [Music] pay privately and the only doctor the only dentist i can find is from the opposite gender in this case insha'allah it's permissible for necessity
